A printer that can print on 3D objects, allowing users to create customized sculptures and art pieces.
A printer that can print edible items, such as chocolate or candy, allowing users to create personalized treats.
A printer that can print on flexible materials, such as fabric or plastic, allowing users to create customized clothing or accessories.
A printer that can print on transparent materials, such as glass or acrylic, allowing users to create customized windows or other transparent objects.
A printer that can print on biodegradable materials, such as paper made from bamboo or hemp, allowing users to create eco-friendly products.
